flavor:
"Amateurs feign it as 'random packet loss'. They do this for safety. They do this out of fear. But why should we cower? We will collapse the Corporatocracy, piece by piece! They are not the ones to fear. We are."
- Freedom Khumalo
text:
When you access cards from R&D, access 1 additional card.
Trash eXer if the Corp purges virus counters.
title: eXer

flavor:
"It makes every bad thing that you do so much better."
- g00ru
text: Whenever you trash a Corp card, you may place 1 virus counter on Friday Chip. When your turn begins, you may move 1 hosted virus counter to a virus program.
title: Friday Chip

flavor: You'd think someone would have noticed a program entitled "Career Opportunities in Hacking" earlier.
text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. The first time you install a card each turn, the Corp loses 1[credit].
title: Corporate "Grant"

text: The first time you would take any number of tags or suffer any amount of net damage each turn, you may trash No One Home to force the Corp to "<trace>Trace 0</trace> If unsuccessful, the Runner avoids any number of tags or prevents any amount of net damage."
title: No One Home

text: When your turn ends, you may name a card type. Gain 2[credit] the first time each turn the Runner plays or installs a card that has the type you last named this way.
title: Azmari EdTech: Shaping the Future

flavor: "Welcome to Azmari Mall! You have 4,196 unread messages."
text: When your turn begins, the Runner draws 1 card, then you may gain 1[credit] for every 2 cards in the grip.
title: Personalized Portal
